tp:docstring.p: Telepathy clients use connection managers, the channel dispatcher and optionally the account manager to provide useful functionality.
User interface processes are the obvious example of Telepathy clients, but they can provide other functionality, such as address-book synchronization.
The Client D-Bus interface mainly represents a process to which the channel dispatcher can dispatch channels.
